00020 /**
00021 \file ctai_datatypes.h
00022 \brief Utility functions for working with data types.
00023

00025

00027 
00028 
00029 #ifndef NL_VORTECH_CTAI_DATA_TYPS_H
00030 #define NL_VORTECH_CTAI_DATA_TYPS_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033 extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 /** \brief Get a CTA_Datatype object describing the data type given in string representation
00036  *
00037  *  \param dt I description of data type in string form
00038  *  \return CTA_Datatype describing the data type, CTA_NULL if data type is unknown
00039  */
00040 const CTA_Datatype CTAI_String2Type(const char *dt);
00041 
00042 
00043 
00044 /** \brief Get string representation of CTA_Datatype object
00045  *
00046  *  \param datatype I CTA_Datatype object describing the data type
00047  *  \return pointer to string containing description of data type ("CTA_ILLEGAL_DATATYPE" if unknown)
00048  */
00049 const char *CTAI_Type2String(CTA_Datatype datatype);
00050 #ifdef __cplusplus
00051 }
00052 #endif
00053 #endif
